# Figure 2: speed by mass and temp treatment
```{r}
load("data/outputs/dat3_nonas.Rda")
dat3_nonas %>% ggplot(aes(x = mass, y = sline_speed_m_s, col = treatment))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  ylab("Burst speed (m/s)")+
  xlab("Mass (g)")+
  theme_minimal()+
  guides(color = guide_legend(title = "Temperature \n treatment"))
```
